attributes.action: Better food for our British Army
attributes.additional_details:
Our soldiers are being severed slop !!  They need and deserve better food . Sadly soldiers are going hungry, because they can’t eat the slop that is dished up. Raw chicken has been served a few times !! 
You get better food in prison !!
attributes.background:
To provide a high standard of food for our soldiers. To cook good home-sum food . 
To investigate into these catering companies . And to make sure they are above standard . After all they are feeding the Queens Army.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure exactly how you'd like things to change and awhat you mean by "good home-sum food"
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, such as increase funding for food provision in the armed fofrces, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
